thread.title: Kate Middleton visited children’s mental health treatment charity, the Duchess debuted new bangs
thread.title_full: Kate Middleton visited children’s mental health treatment charity, the Duchess debuted new bangs

author: contact@inrumor.com
title: Kate Middleton visited children’s mental health treatment charity, the Duchess debuted new bangs
text:
Tweet 
The Duchess of Cambridge make her first solo appearance since giving birth to her second child, for a cause that is very close to her heart: the support of a children’s mental health charity. 
The royal, who wore a Ralph Lauren dress, visited the Anna Freud Centre on Thursday and showed off her new bangs. 
A video of the Duchess of Cambridge’s arrival at the Center was shared by The Royal Family Channel. 
See the video below. 
The Kensington Palace posted some photos and a video of Kate testing the SmartGym learning technology at The Anna Freud Centre’s Family School where interactive learning is used to improve children’s attention and concentration. The Duchess views @AFCevents plans for a new centre of excellence bringing leaders in mental health work together pic.twitter.com/uJMVKgaXv4 
— Kensington Palace (@KensingtonRoyal) September 17, 2015 HRH takes part in a multi family activity that helps with communication skills and self confidence #AnnaFreudCentre pic.twitter.com/rAWasdXH9t 
— Kensington Palace (@KensingtonRoyal) September 17, 2015 . @AFCevents Family School uses interactive learning to help improve children's attention and concentration pic.twitter.com/aYx2cCgirt 
— Kensington Palace (@KensingtonRoyal) September 17, 2015 The Duchess of Cambridge has a go at the SmartGym learning technology @AFCevents Family School pic.twitter.com/zwQfR2tqrn 
— Kensington Palace (@KensingtonRoyal) September 17, 2015 
“We are absolutely delighted that you are here and very grateful and hope that today you will get a real insight into all aspects of our work,” Michael Samuel, chairman of Trustees, told the royal mother. “Your continued support on this very important issue will be an invaluable ingredient towards making the real and urgent progress which is necessary in this area.” 
Prince William, the Duchess of Cambridge, née Kate Middleton, and Prince Harry will attend on October 26 the premiere of the next James Bond movie, Spectre. 
Kate and William are also set for a tour next year and although the destination is still unknown, reports have suggested that the royal couple will make a Caribbean tour. Their two adorable children, Princess Charlotte, 4 months old, and Prince George, 2, are unlike to accompany their parents on the tour. Spread the rumor
